ci_support_linux_64_.yaml:
c_compiler:
- gcc
c_compiler_version:
- '14'
c_stdlib:
- sysroot
c_stdlib_version:
- '2.17'
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cxx_compiler:
- gxx
cxx_compiler_version:
- '14'
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
fortran_compiler:
- gfortran
fortran_compiler_version:
- '14'
openmpi:
- '5'
target_platform:
- linux-64
zip_keys:
- - c_compiler_version
  - cxx_compiler_version
  - fortran_compiler_version

about.description: ELMFIRE is an operational wildland fire spread model. Some of its common applications include; Forecasting spread of fires in real time, Reconstructing spread of historical fires, Quantifying landscape-scale potential fire behavior potential, and Estimating annual burn probability and fire severity.
about.summary: Eulerian Level set Model of FIRE Spread

about.description: ELMFIRE is an operational wildland fire spread model. Some of its common applications include; Forecasting spread of fires in real time, Reconstructing spread of historical fires, Quantifying landscape-scale potential fire behavior potential, and Estimating annual burn probability and fire severity.
about.summary: Eulerian Level set Model of FIRE Spread

name: elmfire
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "elmfire" %}
{% set version = "2025.0717" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://github.com/lautenberger/{{ name }}/archive/refs/tags/{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 0f49f900226c8dfebde6492c871d837a49ed5ef6f0e1b75388834a550b11eace

build:
  number: 0
  skip: true  # [not linux]
  script_env:
    - ELMFIRE_VERSION={{ version }}

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ stdlib('c') }}
    - {{ compiler('cxx') }}
    - {{ compiler('c') }}
    - {{ compiler('fortran') }}
    - make
    - sed
  host:
    - openmpi
  run:
    - openmpi
    - _openmp_mutex  # [linux]

test:
  commands:
    - test -f $PREFIX/bin/elmfire_lowmem
    - test -f $PREFIX/bin/elmfire_debug_lowmem
    - test -f $PREFIX/bin/elmfire_post_lowmem
    - test -f $PREFIX/bin/elmfire_post_debug_lowmem
    - test -f $PREFIX/bin/elmfire
    - test -f $PREFIX/bin/elmfire_debug
    - test -f $PREFIX/bin/elmfire_post
    - test -f $PREFIX/bin/elmfire_post_debug

about:
  home: https://elmfire.io/
  license: EPL-2.0
  license_file: LICENSE.md
  summary: Eulerian Level set Model of FIRE Spread
  description: ELMFIRE is an operational wildland fire spread model. Some of its common applications include; Forecasting spread of fires in real time, Reconstructing spread of historical fires, Quantifying landscape-scale potential fire behavior potential, and Estimating annual burn probability and fire severity.
  doc_url: https://elmfire.io/user_guide.html
  dev_url: https://github.com/lautenberger/elmfire

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - lautenberger
    - mccarthyryanc
